name: Pantera inspired FUCKING HOSTILE digital cross stitch sweatshirt
description: To weave, to knit - cannot be done! In turn you're making us...FUCKING HOSTILE. Screen printed Gildan sweatshirts with a twee digitally inspired cross stitch design in white. Sizing (approx) to fit chest: S - 34/36 M - 38/40 L - 42/44 XL 46/48 50% cotton/50% polyester This is the third run of these jumpers and I only ever print them in batches of 20, so order early to avoid disappointment. Once they are gone there will be NO MORE PRINTED until next year. Please ensure that you select the correct size from the drop down menu below.

name: Holy Shit Christmas card
description:
Give to friend or foe this Christmas.

Professionally printed on 300gsm FSC certified card stock. Shipped with a white envelope in a cello bag. Sent via 1st class mail in a hardback envelope to prevent damage.

Feel free to use the crosses as a guide to cross stitch into. GO WILD. 

Blank inside for your own message.

name: Fuck Yeah Christmas card
description:
Give to friend or foe this Christmas.

Professionally printed on 300gsm FSC certified card stock. Shipped with a white envelope in a cello bag. Sent via 1st class mail in a hardback envelope to prevent damage.

Feel free to use the crosses as a guide to cross stitch into. GO WILD.

name: M-fucking birthday card
description:
The most unoffensive offensive birthday card you'll ever give.

'Mother fucking birthday' original digital cross stitch design professionally printed on 325g card stock in either peach or a fetching pastel blue.

Cards measure 148 x 148mm. Each card comes cello wrapped and with a white envelope. Blank inside for your own message.

Cards will be sent out in a board backed envelope via 1st class mail.

name: Digital cross stitch badge
description:
Show your cross stitch love with one of these little beauties.

Digital cross stitch design printed and pressed onto 1 1/2 inch button badges using top quality metal components. 2 designs available, baby pink skull and charcoal grey hell yeah.
